text:
The enclosed PNG icons aren't exactly the best converts; under Mozilla/IE the
background isn't transparent as it should be. I've taken the liberty of
reconverting them from the GIF versions, including the one animated GIF into a
MNG. Note that due to a bug in Netscape 4, these icons will still look rather icky.

http://www.ecks.org/misc/apache-newicons.tar.gz

Additionally, here is a patch for docs/conf/mime.types which adds Ogg Vorbis,
MNG, JNG and DJVU MIME types:

http://www.ecks.org/misc/mimetypes.patch

Keep up the good work!
creator: eric@ecks.org
slive@apache.org
text:
It is our policy to only add IANA registered types to the mime types file.

As far as the PNG files, I'll leave that to someone who knows these things
to take a look.

creator: trawick@apache.org
text:
I'm going through the bug db to make sure patches are findable.  Please see 
http://httpd.apache.org/dev/patches.html

URL for the Icons 404s. Bug is over 2 years old w/o feedback.
Unless anyone has a problem, I am marking this as closed.
creator: chip@force-elite.com
